Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 not out in just 26 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Robin Uthappa: 'Suryakumar's ability to change his shot at last second standout'
India finished as the top team in Group A
Miscellaneous Highlights: India struggled to force the pace on the ball on a sluggish surface
Ayush Shukla broke the stand between Rohit Sharma and KL Rahul
Avesh Khan and Arshdeep Singh looked off colour
Others: Rohit Sharma and KL Rahul started slowly
Nizakat Khan was run out on the last ball of the powerplay
Yuzvendra Chahal and Jadeja then conceded only 14 in the next four overs
Zeeshan Ali and Scott McKechnie hit a flurry of boundaries in the final two overs
